vote.title: To amend Ordinance No. 3349-2024, passed by Columbus City Council on December 16, 2024, to allow for a correction of the name listed within the ordinance from “The Commons at Grant (TC2) Senior Housing Limited Partnership” to “The Commons at Grant Limited Partnership”; and to declare an emergency. ($0.00)
vote.description:
Explanation
 
BACKGROUND:  This legislation authorizes an amendment to Ordinance No. 3349-2024, passed by Columbus City Council on December 16, 2024, to allow for a correction of the name listed within the ordinance.  
 
Ordinance No. 3349-2024, passed by Columbus City Council on December 16, 2024, authorized the Director of the Department of Development to forgive the principal on a loan to The Commons at Grant Limited Partnership, as well as authorized the Director of the Department of Development to execute the necessary documents to convey the title of the property located at 398 S. Grant Ave. Columbus, Ohio 43215 to The Commons at Grant (TC2) Senior Housing Limited Partnership.  It was recently discovered that the name listed in the ordinance was incorrect as a clerical error occurred in adding “Senior” to their name.  The legal name, as registered with the Ohio Secretary of State, is “The Commons at Grant (TC2) Housing Limited Partnership”.  Upon further review and discussions with The Commons at Grant Limited Partnership it was deemed that actually the conveyance of the title of the property will need to be with The Commons at Grant Limited Partnership and not The Commons at Grant (TC2) Housing Limited Partnership.”  The Commons at Grant Limited Partnership will upon closing of all financing will transfer the property to “The Commons at Grant (TC2) Housing Limited Partnership.   All other aspects of the ordinance remain the same.
 
Emergency action is requested in order to correct this error to assure that progress with conveyance of the title is not hindered in any way and the proper documentation can be reflected within their recorded files.
 
Title
 
To amend Ordinance No. 3349-2024, passed by Columbus City Council on December 16, 2024, to allow for a correction of the name listed within the ordinance from “The Commons at Grant (TC2) Senior Housing Limited Partnership” to “The Commons at Grant Limited Partnership”; and to declare an emergency. ($0.00)
 
 
Body
 
WHEREAS, Ordinance No. 3349-2024, passed by Columbus City Council on December 16, 2024, authorized the Director of the Department of Development to forgive the principal on a loan to The Commons at Grant Limited Partnership, as well as authorized the Director of the Department of Development to execute the necessary documents to convey the title of the property located at 398 S. Grant Ave. Columbus, Ohio 43215 to The Commons at Grant (TC2) Senior Housing Limited Partnership; and
 
WHERAS, it was recently discovered that a clerical error occurred in adding “(TC2) Senior Housing” to the name of the organization.  The legal name, as registered with the Ohio Secretary of State, is “The Commons at Grant Limited Partnership”; and
 
WHEREAS, the Director of the Department of Development requests that Ordinance No. 3349-2024 be amended in order to correct the organization name: and
 
WHEREAS, an emergency exists in the usual daily operation of the Department of Development in that it is immediately necessary to amend Ordinance 3349-2024, passed by Columbus City Council on December 16, 2024 in order correct the clerical error within the ordinance and to assure that the conveyance of the title is not hindered in any way and the proper documentation can be reflected within their recorded files thereby preserving the public health, peace, property, safety, and welfare; NOW THEREFORE
 
BE IT ORDAINED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS:
 
SECTION 1.  That within the title of Ordinance No. 3349-2024, passed by Columbus City Council on December 16,2024, be amended to read as follows:  The Commons at Grant (TC2) Senor Housing Limited Partnership to The Commons at Grant Limited Partnership.
 
SECTION 2.  That SECTION 2. Of Ordinance No 3349-2024 be amended as follows:
 
SECTION 2. To authorize the Director of the Department of Development to execute any and all necessary agreements and deeds for the conveyance of title to two parcels of real estate to The Commons at Grant (TC2) Senior Housing Limited Partnership The Commons at Grant Limited Partnership:
PARCEL NUMBER:                                                               (010-018957)
ADDRESS:                                                                                    398 S. Grant St., Columbus, Ohio 43215
PRICE                                                                                                         $0
 
PARCEL NUMBER                                                                (010-264283)
ADDRESS:                                                                                    398 S. Grant St. Columbus, Ohio 43215
PRICE:                                                                                    $0
 
 
SECTION 3.  That for the reasons stated in the preamble hereto, which is hereby made a part hereof, this ordinance is hereby declared to be an emergency measure which shall take effect and be in force from and after its passage and approval by the Mayor, or ten days after passage if the Mayor neither approves nor vetoes it.
